glsa.title: Docker: Information disclosure
glsa.synopsis: A flaw in Docker allowed possible information leakage.

background.p: Docker is the worldâ€™s leading software containerization platform.

description.p: It was found that Docker created network bridges which by default accept IPv6 router advertisements.

impact.p: An attacker who gained access to a container with CAP_NET_RAW capability may be able to to spoof router advertisements, resulting in information disclosure or denial of service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Docker users should upgrade to the latest version:
